meta.title: Fasket | Groceries & essentials delivered across Badr City
meta.description: Fasket is a full online supermarket for Badr City, Cairo—order groceries and daily essentials via the app or web with fast delivery, ongoing offers, and transparent prices.
meta.keywords: Fasket, Badr City delivery, groceries, supermarket, fast delivery Egypt, PWA, Android app
meta.ogDescription: Shop groceries and essentials with Fasket on mobile or web. Fast delivery in Badr City with clear prices and Arabic/English support.

hero.title: Groceries and daily needs in one fast app
hero.subtitle: Fasket is a full online supermarket for Badr City, Cairo—order everything you need via app or PWA with ongoing offers, clear prices, and an easy Arabic/English experience.
hero.location: Serving every district in Badr City

why.title: Why Fasket
why.subtitle: Aligned with the same features inside the mobile app

items.title: Fast delivery
items.description: Priority dispatch and live ETA that matches the app tracker.

items.title: Clear prices
items.description: Transparent pricing with the same promos you see in-app.

items.title: Fresh items
items.description: Cold-chain friendly delivery for produce and dairy.

items.title: Live support
items.description: Human support in Arabic or English whenever you need it.

items.title: Smooth checkout
items.description: One-tap reorder, saved addresses, and secure payments.

items.title: City-wide coverage
items.description: From District 1 to the Industrial Zone, we deliver everywhere.

items.description: See stock status and honest fees before you pay.

items.title: Track delivery

items.title: One-handed UI

items.title: Secure payments

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need before placing an order

items.a: Yes. Fasket delivers across all Badr City districts including the industrial zone.

items.q: Can I pay cash on delivery?
items.a: Cash on delivery and secure card payments are both available at checkout.
Average delivery time is 35–45 minutes depending on your area and basket size.
Yes. Switch between Arabic and English instantly from the top of the page.
Daily promo codes and loyalty rewards are available inside the app.
Use the WhatsApp button or call the hotline inside the app for live help.

cta.title: Ready to order with Fasket?
cta.subtitle: Open the PWA now or install the Android app to shop in minutes.

footer.tagline: Smart shopping and rapid delivery designed for Badr City.
